title: New USDA-NIFA Grant Awarded
description: Awarded a two-year research federal grant from USDA-NIFA for "Detecting Subacute Ruminal Acidosis using a real-time Deep Learning Algorithm"

title: PhD Student Defense Success
description: PhD student Memari Majid successfully defended his dissertation and will graduate in Fall 2023

title: Illinois Innovation Network Grant
description: Granted a one-year seed research grant from ILLINOIS INNOVATION NETWORK.

title: Outstanding Thesis Award
description: Graduate student Subash Kharel received the Outstanding Thesis Award 2021.

title: USDA-NIFA Grant for AI in Livestock
description: Secured a two-year research federal grant from USDA-NIFA titled "Artificial Intelligence for Greener Livestock: Educational and Research."
